name: Basic Blueprint
content:
name: CLIBasicUC1
  iteration: 1
  description: BasicUbuntu
  inputs:
    count:
      type: integer
      minimum: 1
      default: 1
      maximum: 2
      title: Number of Instances
  resources:
    BasicUbuntu:
      type: Cloud.Machine
      properties:
        name: BasicUbuntu
        image: ubuntu
        flavor: small
        count: '${input.count}'
